subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nasir Robinson scored 15 points and No. 4 Pittsburgh overcame an awful start to beat No. 25 West Virginia, 71-66, on Monday night in Morgantown, W.Va.
snippet: Nasir Robinson scored 15 points and No. 4 Pittsburgh overcame an awful start to beat No. 25 West Virginia, 71-66, on Monday night in Morgantown, W.Va.
